replies.body:
Ahh Ok... I guess u wouldnt know how that works? 

I am trying to do the XML so I can out it on my modified PGM scrim server... this is not for avicus...


On my avicus map, I need someone to do it to make sure it works...

So i guess you can't help?

Its Ok

replies.body:
I know some OCN XML, I develop maps on Equinox which uses cardinal.

You're using the enchantments wrong, and you're also supplying logs in the kit wrong. If you want to add a certain type, you need to reference the data value. In the case for spruce wood, it'd be damage="1". Put that in the same line as material and amount, etc.

You also are using lime wool, for some reason, when one team has blue wool and the teams are red vs blue.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Also, moved to Off Topic since it isn't an Avicus XML we're fixing.
